title: alaru kuriyaga
sahitya:
alaru kuriyaga AdenadI alakala kulukula alamElumanga





caraNam 1







araviri Aubagula ativalu meccaga aratera maragAna AdenadI



varusan apUrva duvAlapu tirupula harigari gimpuca AdenadI







caraNam 2



 

matlapu malapula mattalikalapule tattadi nadapula dAtenadI



pEttina vijrapu pende putalukulu attitu cimmucu alamElumanga





caraNam 3



cindula pATala siripolayAtala andelamUtalan AdenadI



kanduva tiru venkaTapati meccaga andapu tirupula alamElumanga
